alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 23 at 3:53PM EST until December 23 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Piscataquis County in north central Maine... Somerset County in west central Maine... * Until 445 PM EST. * At 352 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Jackman to 13 miles west of Blanchard to Kingsbury Plantation, moving north at 95 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Dover-Foxcroft, Dexter, Greenville, Guilford, Ripogenus, Brownville Junction, Mount Katahdin, Milo, Monson, Blanchard, Caucomgomoc Lake, Lobster Lake, Tamway, White Cap Mountain, Ebeemee, Kingsbury Plantation, Telos Lake, Kokadjo, Northeast Carry and Baker Lake. This includes State Highway 11 between Brownville and Brownville Junction. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
